html: As chairman of the Cybersecurity Subcommittee I’m glad we were able to adopt a number of important cyber measures in the #NDAA. One of the most vital is a provision that will allow the DoD expanded authority to conduct cyber operations needed to help keep America safe.
text: As chairman of the Cybersecurity Subcommittee I’m glad we were able to adopt a number of important cyber measures in the #NDAA. One of the most vital is a provision that will allow the DoD expanded authority to conduct cyber operations needed to help keep America safe.

html: It also includes a provision I offered to help military members transition into civilian life. Our unemployment rate is the lowest it has been in nearly 2 decades & this will help promote military members’ talents to employers across the country.
text: It also includes a provision I offered to help military members transition into civilian life. Our unemployment rate is the lowest it has been in nearly 2 decades & this will help promote military members’ talents to employers across the country.

html: #NDAA includes a provision I offered that would require DoD to report the number of eligible military members able to participate in the Transition Assistance Program following their service.

html: Lastly, we were able to secure a verbal commitment from the Chairman to work with us to fix an Obama-era proposal known as the ‘surplus water rule,’ which restricts South Dakotans’ access to water in Corps-controlled land. South Dakotans are legally entitled to use the water.
text: Lastly, we were able to secure a verbal commitment from the Chairman to work with us to fix an Obama-era proposal known as the ‘surplus water rule,’ which restricts South Dakotans’ access to water in Corps-controlled land. South Dakotans are legally entitled to use the water.

html: We were also able to secure a provision for the Corps to carry out a project for shoreline stabilization on the Lower Brule Reservation. This much-needed project will help fix erosion that is threatening an entire community and the surrounding environment.
text: We were also able to secure a provision for the Corps to carry out a project for shoreline stabilization on the Lower Brule Reservation. This much-needed project will help fix erosion that is threatening an entire community and the surrounding environment.

html: It prioritizes implementation of the Upper Missouri River Basin snowpack monitoring program that I’ve been calling for since taking office. This program will help mitigate the possibility of a flood event for those living near the Missouri River.

html: The Black Hills National Cemetery was established in 1948 to serve as a final resting place for area veterans. With roughly 680 burials/year, it was previously on track to run out of space in the early 2030s. https://www.rounds.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/rounds-thune-enzi-bill-to-double-size-of-black-hills-veterans-cemetery-heads-to-president …

html: Because the state inspection programs are required to be ‘at least equal to’ or better than the federal inspection standards, products that pass state inspection should be able to be sold across state lines.
text: Because the state inspection programs are required to be ‘at least equal to’ or better than the federal inspection standards, products that pass state inspection should be able to be sold across state lines.

html: Currently in South Dakota, cattle, sheep, swine and goat products are limited to markets within the state even though they are required to go through inspection at an FSIS-approved state facility.
text: Currently in South Dakota, cattle, sheep, swine and goat products are limited to markets within the state even though they are required to go through inspection at an FSIS-approved state facility.

html: Today, @SenAngusKing and I introduced a bill to allow local meat & poultry products to be sold across state lines. At a time of economic downturn in the ag sector, opening up new markets for SD products is critically important.

html: The boost we’re giving to our armed forces will strengthen missile defense, fund new weapons equipment and invest in measures to help us counter threats from our enemies such as ISIS and North Korea.

html: After years of underfunding, the omnibus provides a $61 billion boost in funding for our armed forces, so they can be better equipped to defend our nation.
text: After years of underfunding, the omnibus provides a $61 billion boost in funding for our armed forces, so they can be better equipped to defend our nation.

html: The omnibus gives a 2.4 percent pay raise to our hardworking men and women in uniform – the largest pay increase for our troops in nearly a decade.
text: The omnibus gives a 2.4 percent pay raise to our hardworking men and women in uniform – the largest pay increase for our troops in nearly a decade.

html: I believe that a comprehensive assessment of IHS is a necessary first step toward making calculated and systematic changes at IHS.
text: I believe that a comprehensive assessment of IHS is a necessary first step toward making calculated and systematic changes at IHS.

html: For many in my home state and across the country, fixing the broken IHS is literally a matter of life and death.
text: For many in my home state and across the country, fixing the broken IHS is literally a matter of life and death.

html: IHS will continue to fail unless we take a close look into the operations, funding, quality of care, and management at IHS.
text: IHS will continue to fail unless we take a close look into the operations, funding, quality of care, and management at IHS.

html: While many believe that IHS is underfunded, from my standpoint, investing more taxpayer money into a dysfunctional system will only compound the problem. IHS lacks an efficient system and accountability; this needs to be addressed before we consider funding.
text: While many believe that IHS is underfunded, from my standpoint, investing more taxpayer money into a dysfunctional system will only compound the problem. IHS lacks an efficient system and accountability; this needs to be addressed before we consider funding.
